title: Edit Release Notes Quarkus 3.0.0 CR1

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

Please. can somebody add to list "Bump JDBC PostgreSQL Driver to 42.6.0" ? Because i see it in fresh pom (at CR1 tag),
but can't see it in Release notes. i was waitng release, where version would be updated, but it is already done silently...
Besides, 42.6.0 provides very important patch. They mostly replaced synchronized blocks with Reentrant Lock. So, now it is production ready to work with Loom (Virtual Threads).
See https://jdbc.postgresql.org/changelogs/2023-03-17-42.6.0-release/

### Implementation ideas

just add one line to release notes, please :D
